content.en: ATM Switch Enhancements: Researchers have been exploring various ways to improve the performance and capabilities of large-scale ATM switch systems. They have developed new switch architectures and high-speed arbitration control algorithms to increase the switching capacity. Additionally, they have focused on designing scalable multicast ATM switches by implementing cell replication, routing, output contention resolution, and addressing algorithms. These advancements aim to enhance the efficiency and reliability of ATM interfaces and switches, ultimately improving the overall performance of the network.
content.da: ATM-switcheforbedringer: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige måder at forbedre ydeevnen og kapaciteterne for store ATM-switsystems. De har udviklet nye switch-arkitekturer og højhastigheds arbitreringskontrolalgoritmer for at øge switchkapaciteten. Derudover har de fokuseret på at designe skalerbare multicast ATM-switche ved at implementere celle-replikation, routing, output-kontentionsløsning og adresseringsalgoritmer. Disse fremskridt sigter mod at forbedre effektiviteten og pålideligheden af ATM-grænseflader og switche, hvilket i sidste ende skal forbedre den samlede netværksydelse.
